front.title: IEEE Draft Guide and Tutorial for the Application of High-Voltage (> 1000 V) Fuses and Accessories

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Information for understanding the construction, operation, and application of high-voltage (> 1000 V) fuses and accessories, intended for use on alternating current (ac) electrical distribution systems is provided. Current-limiting, expulsion, electronic, and other non-current-limiting fuses and accessories are covered, as are North American, European, and other application practices.
